articles.content: So here we go for season 2022/23 and the Robins eighth consecutive Championship campaign. The West Country club have managed to keep hold of all of their key players this summer and added several sma… [+2248 chars]

articles.title: Henrik Stenson admits huge money offered by Saudi-backed LIV Golf played a factor in signing up - Daily Mail
articles.description: Stenson had helped Europe to victory in three of his five Ryder Cup appearances as a player but Ryder Cup Europe said he could no longer fulfil contractual obligations as captain.
articles.content: Henrik Stenson said on Thursday that money definitely played a part in his switch to the lucrative Saudi-backed LIV Golf series and he had hoped to retain his Ryder Cup captaincy which he was strippe… [+2725 chars]
